name: Advenio Software
tag_list: advenio-software, gmdss, software-simulator, cbt, computer-based-training, software-development, mobile-software, web-sites
overview:
Advenio Software S.R.L. is a company integrated by computer science professionals with large experience in different fields of computer application’s development. The company specializes in software engineering, developing high quality products as a result of the application of new technologies and ongoing research and training tasks.

In Advenio Software we specialize in software engineering, emphasizing on the product quality, implementation of new technologies, continuous research and training. We are aware of the importance that software has for our customers as an essential tool for achieving its objectives and we are committed to the success of projects jointly assumed.

As we stated in our quality policy, we strive to meet and exceed customer expectations, creating long-term relationships based on trust and mutual benefit.

Advenio is a Latin word which means to arrive. In our professional activity, we consider very important to achieve our goals working with firmness, enthusiasm and perseverance.
